form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: ICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 PLACE AAORSTUNG 101, WU-FU 3RD NOTTE 608 ICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS KAOHSIUNG R.O.C FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION OCT 13, 1986 CITY COUNTRY the request of the American Consul at HONG KONG NAME AGE SEX CHI CHOU CHING-YING 71 F I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY Ministry of ON (74) MFA 1873959 Forsign Affairs MAY 27, 1986 Valpal Talwan R.O.C. I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid L ymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale fuberculosis, active Leprosy. infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7. USPHS Regs.) CLASS B. Physical Defect. Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being CLASS C Minor Conditions (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect. disease. or disability. (2) Defect, disease. or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity. as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Class C : 1). S/P hysterectomy. 2). H/O left hip & spine fracture, probably due to senile osteoporosis. 3). Mild kyphosis. 4). S/P cataract surgery OU. Chest X-ray report No active lesion in the both sides of lung. Senile atterinsclernsis. Both hilar enlarged. from Dr. I KO Radiologist Blood serological report VDRL - negative from Dr. President Clinical Laboratory Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT ma Chan mo Medical Examiner OCT 16, 1986 Mei S Chen M.D., M.S. 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) #U.S.GPO:1980-0-311-153/6143 Dept. of State
